seccommerce.secsigner.ext
Class SecSignerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  seccommerce.secsigner.ext.SecSignerAdapter

public class SecSignerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Adapter for calling SecSigner without implementing the callbacks.

Version:
$Id: SecSignerAdapter.java,v 1.20 2013/08/14 07:42:44 tk Exp $
Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg

public SecSignerAdapter(java.lang.String installPath,
                        java.lang.String propertyFileName)
                 throws SecSignerException
Creates a new SecSigner adapter. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c. Called by SecCryptoSP.c (after correction).

Parameters:
installPath - installation path
propertyFileName - name of property file
Throws:
SecSignerException

Method Detail

signMulti

public final void signMulti(SignatureRecord[] signatureRecordArray,
                            byte[][] cipherCert,
                            byte[][] signingKeyAndOrCertData)
                     throws SecSignerException
Signs multiple data and returns the PKCS#7 signatures. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Parameters:
signatureRecordArray - SignatureRecord[] container for data to be signed
cipherCert - encrypt the signed PKCS#7 object with these certificates or offer encryption dialog if cipherCert == new byte[0][]
signingKeyAndOrCertData - a software key (PKCS#8 or PKCS#12) and/or corresponding or desired certificate (DER encoded)
Throws:
SecSignerException - signature failed

signRaw

public final byte[] signRaw(byte[] hashToSign,
                            byte[] requestedCert)
                     throws SecSignerException
Signs a hash. Called by CPSignHash. Called by SecCryptoSP.c.

Parameters:
hashToSign - hash to be signed
requestedCert - certificate to use for signing
Throws:
SecSignerException

initSmartCard

public final byte[][] initSmartCard()
                             throws SecSignerException
Initializes the smart card. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c. The returned byte arrays are in little endian, because they are intended to be used by Microsoft.

Returns:
the DER encoded certificates.
Throws:
SecSignerException - card init failed

getPubExpAndKeyFromCert

public byte[][] getPubExpAndKeyFromCert(byte[] certDer)
                                 throws SecSignerException
Gets the public exponent and the modulus of a certificate. The returned byte arrays are in little endian, because they are intended to be used by Microsoft.

Parameters:
certDer - the DER encoded certificates
Returns:
two byte arrays: the public exponent and the certificate
Throws:
SecSignerException

verify

public final int verify(SignatureRecord[] signatureRecord,
                        byte[][] externalSignersCertsDer,
                        boolean offerFileOpenDlg,
                        boolean oscpMandatory,
                        boolean allowSig,
                        boolean modal)
                 throws SecSignerException
Verify signed data: invoke the verify process of the SecSigner-GUI. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Parameters:
signatureRecord - document to be signed, its signature, timestamp, ...
externalSignersCertsDer - array of certificates which include the certificate of the signer. Required if the signature does not contain the certificate.
offerFileOpenDlg - if true offer a file-open-dialog if data are missing, else return an error then
oscpMandatory - automatically send oscp request if true
allowSig - if false then the user cannot sign the verified document
modal - if true, dialog blocks input to other app windows when shown
Returns:
the updated signature if the user decided to sign after verify
Throws:
SecSignerException

encryptDataOnly

public final void encryptDataOnly(SignatureRecord[] signatureRecord,
                                  byte[][] cipherCert)
                           throws SecSignerException
Encrypts data without signing for given data and encryption certificates. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Parameters:
signatureRecord - SignatureRecord[]
cipherCert - encryption certificates
Throws:
SecSignerException

close

public final void close()
Closes the SecSigner. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c. Called by SecCryptoSP.c.

getCardName

public final java.lang.String getCardName()
                                   throws SecSignerException
Gets the name of the signature card in the first card reader. 'Null' will be returned if that card has not yet been initialized. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Returns:
name of signature card in first card reader
Throws:
SecSignerException - if the SecSigner has been closed already

getCardNumber

public final java.lang.String getCardNumber()
                                     throws SecSignerException
Gets the number printed on the signature card in the first card reader. 'Null' will be returned if that card has not yet been initialized. This method is not part of the target of evaluation of SecSigner in the Common Criteria evaluation.

Returns:
number printed on the signature card in first card reader
Throws:
SecSignerException - if the SecSigner has been closed already

getCardReaderName

public final java.lang.String getCardReaderName()
                                         throws SecSignerException
Gets the name of the first card reader. 'Null' will be returned if that reader has not yet been initialized. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Returns:
first card reader's name.
Throws:
SecSignerException - if the SecSigner has been closed already

getCardReaderFirmwareVersion

public final java.lang.String getCardReaderFirmwareVersion()
                                                    throws SecSignerException,
                                                           seccommerce.sec.SecExceptionCommunication
Gets the firmware version information available from the first card reader. 'Null' will be returned if that reader has not yet been initialized or no information is available. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Returns:
first card reader's firmware version information.
Throws:
seccommerce.sec.SecExceptionCommunication - if the card in the reader is not usable
SecSignerException - if the SecSigner has been closed already

getVersion

public final java.lang.String getVersion()
                                  throws SecSignerException
Gets SecSigner version from licence file in resource jar. Called by CallSecSignerDLL.c.

Returns:
SecSigner's version
Throws:
SecSignerException - if the SecSigner has been closed already

getSignatureLimit

public final int getSignatureLimit()
Gets a possible signature limit (as an alternative to unlimited mass sinature). This limit will be 0 if mass signature is enabled.

Returns:
int signature limit per sign-call

setLicence

public final void setLicence(byte[] licence)
                      throws SecSignerException
Sets licence data (such as the signature limit) for SecSigner.

Parameters:
licence - licence data for SecSigner
Throws:
SecSignerException - if licence is not valid or has not been signed by an approved SecCommerce employee

dragAndDrop

public SecSignerVerifyResult dragAndDrop(boolean modal)
                                  throws SecSignerException
Open SecSigner's drag and drop menu.

Parameters:
modal -
Returns:
result object
Throws:
SecSignerException
